abilities.description:
When you have time to line up a shot and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} from a distance with your sniper rail gun, choose one (before rolling).

  • Body shot: Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
  • Head shot: Mark progress on a hit.

When you are hidden and score a hit with this weapon, you may remain hidden from that foe.
